api.name: Mobile Media API
api.description: The Mobile Media API provides functionalities for playing and capturing sounds and videos.

api.name: Wireless Messaging API
api.description: The Wireless Messaging API provides functionalities for sending and receiving messages (SMS).

api.name: Wireless Messaging API 2.0
api.description: The Wireless Messaging API 2.0 provides functionalities for sending and receiving text and multimedia messages (SMS and MMS).
